segments.text: This kitchen is a sanctuary, yet also a ticking time bomb.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I watch the water overflowing, and it makes my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s serene focus is almost unsettling against the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to tell her to look down, to see the mess that could lead to a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy looks so determined, reaching for those cookies with all his might.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but admire his spirit, even though it’s reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, standing there with her hand raised, embodies pure eagerness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a moment filled with innocent joy, yet it feels clouded by what could go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm garden outside and the turmoil inside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope someone notices before it all comes crashing down.
segments.speaker: PAR
